name: Shady Labs
description: Shady Labs is a privacy infrastructure built on Solana that enables fully private, unlinkable transactions through stealth addresses. Each transfer automatically generates a one-time wallet address, allowing users to receive crypto without revealing their real wallet or identity. All data is encrypted locally and published on-chain in unreadable form, detectable only by the receiver using their private view key. This ensures complete confidentiality between sender and receiver while maintaining blockchain transparency and security.
